message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's a great opportunity for you to get your hands on it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $110.
Thanks for the offer, Alice!  I'm interested, but $110 is a bit steep for me. I'm willing to pay $90 for it.
Thanks for your offer, Bob! I understand that $110 might be a bit steep, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to sell it to you for $105.
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $105 is still a bit too high for me.  I'm sticking to my offer of $90. If you're not willing to go that low, I'll have to go with John's offer.
